en: Interview with Robert (Bob) Waikel, president of Ski Mountain Chalet Rentals, Inc. Waikel discusses the circumstances he faced in dealing with the fire while having a wife suffering from Alzheimer's disease. Waikel recounts not only his evacuation and return, but also the effects seen on the tourism industry. This is a representative quote from the interview: "One of the biggest projects is trying to remember all the personal items you have accumulated over 79 years. You sit down in a room and you go around the room and you try to remember what you had."
